item.title: I am looking for 508 command that shows the bank of another player
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

[quote=“99range k0, post:2, topic:349702”]simply go to your characters folder, load up their name and search for the ID of the item or look for large amounts of items. Its a bit more complex since your looking at it through code format, but still. Also you can log on to their account u kno? I don’t think its possible for a show bank command, maybe there is, but not exactly sure.[/quote] <----- read it…

item.title: I am looking for 508 command that shows the bank of another player
item.dc:creator: @hydropk1 hydropk1
item.description:
@hydropk1 wrote:

i am currently looking for a command such as ::showbank (username), or ::viewbank (username)

this is a simple and efficient fix to stop dupers and people who have staff items or donator items.

so far i have this as my command

if(command.startsWith(“showbank”) && command.length() > 9 && playerRights > 1) {
String otherP = command.substring(0, 7);
Client c = null;
for(Player p : Server.PlayerManager.players) {
if(((Client) p).playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(otherP))
c = (Client) p;
}
if(c == null)
return;
for(int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) {
tempBank[i] = bankItems[i];
tempBankN[i] = bankItemsN[i];
}
for(int i = 0; i < playerBankSize; i++) {
bankItems[i] = c.bankItems[i];
bankItemsN[i] = c.bankItemsN[i];
}
openUpBank();
}

Read full topic
item.source: I am looking for 508 command that shows the bank of another player
